enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: While the pending entry into force of the Kyoto Protocol demonstrates that progress has indeed been made, Tuesday`s discussions showed the re-emergence of past tensions between the COP and the GEF that many thought had subsided.

Equally stuck in molasses seemed the contact group on adverse effects, where delegates remarked that, with few changes in position since SB-20, significant informal consultations will be needed for a decision to be reached at COP-10.
